scripts.example:ansi: nodemon --exec 'elm-esm make examples/AnsiExample.elm --output=dist/example-elm-ansi.js' --watch src --watch examples/src -e elm
scripts.example:terminal: nodemon --exec 'elm-esm make examples/TerminalExample.elm --output=dist/example-elm-terminal.js' --watch src --watch examples/src -e elm
scripts.example:ink: nodemon --exec 'elm-esm make examples/InkExample.elm --output=dist/example-elm-ink.js' --watch src --watch examples/src -e elm
